Titles.home: Apartments in the center of Zagreb

descriptions: Experience Zagreb from the front row! Our Ludwig apartment is located in the very center of the city, ideal for exploring all the main attractions.
Comfortable Benedikt apartment with secure parking, just a few minutes' walk from the main station, perfect for travelers.
Ruta & Lota apartments located near the bus station and airport shuttle, provide convenience and comfort for your stay.

About.title: Luxury Apartments in the Center of Zagreb
des: ## Luxury **Apartments** in the Center of Zagreb
Discover our top-notch apartments in the heart of Zagreb, perfect for your stay.
**Ludwig Center** – 300-square-meter luxury property in central Zagreb near the main train station, offers modern furnishings and amenities for up to 6 people.

**Benedikta Parking** – Centrally located in Zagreb near the main train station, accommodates up to 4 people and features a cozy living room, fully equipped kitchen, dining area, two bedrooms, modern bathroom, terrace, and private parking.
**Art rooms Lota & Ruta** – Guests can use the entire room, including the seating area and bathroom. The private entrance ensures privacy and convenience.
Book now and enjoy the luxury, comfort, and convenience of our apartments!

locations.title: What to visit and see:
des: Explore Ban Jelačić Square, the main square in Zagreb, the center of all city events.
Stroll through the Upper Town, the historic core of Zagreb, with narrow streets, old houses, and beautiful views of the city.
Visit the Cathedral of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary, the most famous cathedral in Zagreb and one of the tallest buildings in Croatia.
Enjoy the beauty of the Botanical Garden, a peaceful oasis in the city center with a rich collection of plants.
Explore the Museum of Broken Relationships, a unique museum dedicated to failed romantic relationships and the items left behind by former partners.
Discover the Zagreb Zoo, located in the beautiful Maksimir Park, ideal for families and animal lovers.
Visit the Mimara Museum, with a rich collection of artworks and cultural artifacts from around the world.
Stroll through Dolac, the most famous market in Zagreb, where you can buy fresh produce and local products.

Apartment_Ludwig_Des.des: Apartment Ludwig is located in the very center of Zagreb, near the main train station. This luxury property covers 300 square meters and offers comfortable accommodation for up to 6 people. The apartment is modernly furnished and equipped with all the necessary amenities for a pleasant stay.
Apartment_Ludwig_Des.subtitle: Space
Apartment_Ludwig_Des.des2: Apartment Ludwig includes a spacious living room with a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and access to the terrace. In addition, guests can enjoy a wellness area with a pool view, terrace, and greenery. The pool is equipped with hydromassage and is ideal for relaxation.
Apartment_Ludwig_Des.des3: Guests can use 3 bedrooms, two modern living rooms, fully equipped kitchens, multiple bathrooms, terraces, and access to the pool and other outdoor amenities.

Apartment_Benedikt_Des.des: Apartment Benedikt is located in the center of Zagreb, just a few minutes' walk from the main train station. This comfortable apartment offers accommodation for up to 4 people and is ideal for families or small groups wanting to explore the city.
Apartment_Benedikt_Des.subtitle: Space
Apartment_Benedikt_Des.des2: Apartment Benedikt includes a cozy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. The apartment also features two bedrooms, a modern bathroom, and a terrace. The private parking area is an added benefit for those traveling by car.
Apartment_Benedikt_Des.des3: Guests can use the entire apartment, including the living room, kitchen, bedrooms, bathroom, and terrace. The private parking area is available for guests.

Room_Lota_Des.des: Art room Lota is a stylish and comfortable room located near the main bus station in Zagreb. This room is ideal for travelers seeking a convenient and cozy place to stay while exploring the city.
Room_Lota_Des.subtitle: Space
Room_Lota_Des.des2: Art room Lota features a comfortable bed, a small seating area, and a modern bathroom. The room is designed with artistic touches and offers a unique ambiance. Free WiFi and air conditioning are available.
Room_Lota_Des.des3: Guests can use the entire room, including the seating area and bathroom. The private entrance ensures privacy and convenience.

Room_Ruta_Des.des: Art room Ruta is a charming room located near the main bus station in Zagreb. It offers a comfortable and stylish stay for travelers visiting the city.
Room_Ruta_Des.subtitle: Space
Room_Ruta_Des.des2: Art room Ruta includes a cozy bed, a small seating area, and a modern bathroom. The room is tastefully decorated with artistic elements, providing a pleasant and inviting atmosphere. Free WiFi and air conditioning are available.
Room_Ruta_Des.des3: Guests can use the entire room, including the seating area and bathroom. The private entrance ensures privacy and convenience.

Payment_conditions.subtitle: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Payment_conditions.title: Payment and Reservation Conditions
Payment_conditions.des2: To secure the reservation, a 30% advance payment of the total price must be made directly to the property owner, with the remaining 70% payable upon arrival at the accommodation unit.
Payment_conditions.des5: On the last day of stay, guests must leave the accommodation by 10 AM to allow other guests to check in from 4 PM.
Payment_conditions.des6: Please note that pets are not allowed on the premises.

steps.title: Send Us an Inquiry
steps.des: Please send us an inquiry via the contact form, email, or phone with all the necessary information and the period you wish to spend your vacation in Zagreb Center Apartments. Expect a quick response via email with our best offer.
steps.des2: To secure the reservation, a 30% advance payment of the total amount is required, with the remainder payable on the day of arrival. After making the payment, please notify us, and we will send you a confirmation of payment and reservation. There are two options for advance payment: bank transfer and PayPal (debit and credit cards).
steps.subtitle: Bank Transfer
steps.des3: After making the payment, we will confirm your payment and reservation. Relax and wait for your vacation and enjoy your stay at Zagreb Center Apartments, - Croatia!

Environs.title: Zagreb and Surroundings
Environs.des: Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, is known for its rich history, culture, and vibrant city life. The city center boasts many restaurants and cafes offering traditional Croatian dishes and international cuisine. Restaurants such as Vinodol, Agava, and Pivnica Medvedgrad are known for their quality and authentic dishes. Zagreb also offers a plethora of cultural and historical landmarks. Don’t miss visiting the Zagreb Cathedral, Upper Town, Museum of Broken Relationships, Croatian National Theatre, and Zrinjevac Park. Jarun and Maksimir are ideal for recreation and relaxation, while Medvednica is perfect for hiking. Additionally, Zagreb offers a vibrant nightlife with numerous bars, clubs, and music events.
Environs.des2: You can get around Zagreb on foot, by public transport, by bike, or by car. The city has a well-organized tram and bus network connecting all parts of the city. Taxis are also available, and many locations offer bike or car rentals. Parking is available in many places, including public parking lots and garages.
